rituals.name: Ward Against Kindred
ingredients: Symbolic representation of the warded area
A personal item from a vampire or a drop of their blood
rituals.summary: Enchants an object or threshold so that vampires crossing it suffer harm or are repelled.
rituals.mechanical_effect: Vampires crossing the ward must test Resolve + Composure (diff 3) or take 1-2 aggravated damage and be pushed back.

rituals.name: Blood Walk
ingredients: A sample of the subject's blood
A reflective surface or bowl of water
rituals.summary: Reveals information about a vampire's lineage and blood resonance.
rituals.mechanical_effect: On success, storyteller reveals sire, clan, generation range, and notable blood-related conditions.

rituals.name: Cleansing Rite
ingredients: Herbs or incense symbolic of purification
rituals.summary: Purifies blood or an object of lingering spiritual or occult contamination.
rituals.mechanical_effect: Removes minor blood curses, weak poisons, or occult taint at ST discretion.

rituals.name: Taste of Future Blood
ingredients: Fresh mortal blood from someone symbolically linked to the question
A focus symbolic of the future event
rituals.summary: By drinking a symbolic mixture of blood, the caster glimpses potential futures related to the subject.
rituals.mechanical_effect: On success, the storyteller provides omens, visions, or mechanical advantage (e.g., +2 dice on one relevant roll in the future scene).

rituals.name: Binding Oath
ingredients: A written or spoken statement of the oath
A symbolic token for each participant
rituals.summary: Binds participants to a sworn oath under mystical consequence.
rituals.mechanical_effect: Breaking the oath inflicts stains, willpower damage, or a minor curse decided by the storyteller.
